title: Strengthening Leadership Practical Competencies: Remote Education Learning Design Mastery Using the HEART Strategy

context.prior_knowledge: Domain expertise in social sciences and basic digital literacy
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can independently create learning designs reflecting their educational philosophy using the HEART strategy at least three times.
Learners can design five or more types of microlearning content optimized for mobile environments and apply them to the development process.
Learners iteratively improve learning designs based on peer feedback at least twice, meeting formative assessment criteria.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
